thread.title: Mozilla Firefox for iOS Preview Release Now Available for Download
thread.title_full: Mozilla Firefox for iOS Preview Release Now Available for Download - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Mozilla Firefox for iOS Preview Release Now Available for Download
text: The first public preview version of a Firefox browser for iOS platform has just been released in App Store, Mozilla announced today. This is the good news. Unfortunately, since this is a preview release, it's only available to a limited number of users. According to Mozilla, the preview version of Firefox for iOS is now available for download in New Zealand . The limited availability of the browser makes perfect sense for a preview version.
